duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee highly complex, large strategic IT initiatives and serve as single point of contact to business sponsors.
Coordinate, schedule, and assign project tasks, team building, monitoring, tracking, analyzing data and project financials, and communicating progress.
Identify and negotiate schedules, milestones, and resources required to meet project objectives.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, engineering teams, product owner, business units, and users to coordinate requirements, testing, implementation, training, and support.
Develop project plans, identify dependencies and risks, and manage risk mitigation and contingency plans.
Conduct presentations regarding program or project status and ensure adherence to project management process and project documentation standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree with 8-12 years relevant experience, or Master's degree with 6-10 years relevant experience.
